subject: Monster offer: $195 per job posting!
body:
Monster offer: $195 per job posting!



$195 for a 2 week posting!*

70% off the regular price of $650!†
For a limited time, you can post your job opening on Monster.ca for only $195 per posting. 
Call Now 1-866-389-9386
or order online. 



* Regular posting duration is 60 days. † 1 time offer only. 






    This special offer is valid until August 15, 2007. 
Contact Monster | Email Spoofing
    To ensure you continue to receive our emails to your inbox, please add communications@monster.ca to your address book. 
    Monster respects your online time and privacy. 
    Remember, Monster will NEVER send you an email requesting that you submit your username and password. Be wary of email spoofing to protect your personal information. If you have any concerns about an email you received from Monster, please contact us. 
    Monster.ca ®
    276 Saint-Jacques Street West, 10th Floor
    Montreal, Quebec H2Y 1N3


 



 
 









        This message was sent to you as an opt-in subscriber to The Speed 
        Network or one of its affiliates. 
        We will continue to bring you valuable offers on the products and 
        services that interest you most. If you wish to unsubscribe, please
        




        Click Here





          Postal opt-out - 1300 NW 17th avenue Ste 218 Delray Beach FL 33445
